summary: "Justice League," a 2017 superhero movie, brings together DC Comics heroes like Batman, Wonder Woman, The Flash, and more to save the world from Steppenwolf. Directed first by Zack Snyder and later by Joss Whedon, the film faced many challenges, including director changes and reshoots. It cost over $300 million to make, making it one of the priciest films ever. Despite this, it didn't do well in theaters and got mixed reviews. A new version, closer to Snyder's original vision, was released in 2021 on HBO Max.
title: Justice League (film)
